column2: "Oekuku no mbowa; ɔafora ne nsa; Ɔato no pon so."

column3: wɔtsea mu Wɔ kurow no nsorɔnsorɔm mbea no do
column7: ɔmman mbra ha: Obiara a onnyim nyansa no dze
column11: Na wɔmbɔnom nsa a mafora no bi."

column4: na hom nnya nkwa; Na hom nnantsew nyansa kwan mu."

column3: noara na onya enyimguase: Na nyia ɔka omumuyɛfo enyim no
amma oeennkyir wo: Ka onyansafo enyim
na obohu nyansa bi so: Kyerɛkyerɛ ɔtseneneenyi
EWURADZE ho suro nye nyansa ahyɛse: Na Krɔnkrɔnnyi no ho nyimdzee nye ntseasee."

column2: "Na emi na mebɛma wo nda adɔɔ so
column3: Na wo nkwa mfe no wɔdze bi bɛka ho."
eyɛ onyansafo ma woho: Na sɛ isi atwetwe a
Wɔ kuropon mu nsorɔnsorɔm mbea egua do."
Wɔnam hɔn kwan do tsenn no dɛ
column6: ɔmman mbra ha: Na obiara a onnyi ntseasee no dze
column10: Na edziban a wodzi no wɔ nsumaa mu no yɛ dɛw."

column2: "Naaso onyia no onnyim dɛ ewufo wɔ hɔ; Dɛ samanadze ebun no mu na hɔn a woehyia hɔn no wɔ."
